00020 #include <hw_init.h>
00021 #include <hw_lcd.h>
00022 #include <hw_uart0.h>
00023 
00024 /*$PAGE*/
00025 /*
00026 *********************************************************************************************************
00027 *                                        InitHFO
00028 *
00029 * Description: This function turns ON the high Frequency Oscillator XT2(7.3728MHz crystal)
00030 *
00031 * Arguments  : none
00032 *
00033 * Returns    : none
00034 *
00035 * Note(s)    : 
00036 *********************************************************************************************************
00037 */
00038 static void InitHFO()
00039 {
00040    int count = 0, timeout = 0;
00041 
00042    /* Turn on HFO XT2  */
00043    BCSCTL1 &= ~(XT2OFF);  
00044 
00045    while(timeout < HFO_TIMEOUT)
00046    {
00047       IFG1 &= ~(OFIFG);
00048 
00049       /* Basic wait until countdown loop      
00050        * apparently, directly polling the 
00051        * OSCFault flag is not recommended
00052        */
00053       for(count = 0; count < 0xff; count++)
00054          ;
00055 
00056       /* Incrment the timeout */
00057       timeout++;
00058 
00059       /* OSCFault flag still set? If yes (1) then clear flag
00060        * and wait some more otherwise no (0) XT2 is up so return.
00061        */
00062       if (!(OFIFG & IFG1))
00063          return; 
00064    }
00065 
00066    /* If made it here then there was an error 
00067    * XT2 failed, shut it down and Clear OSCFault flag.
00068    */  
00069    BCSCTL1 |= XT2OFF;
00070    IFG1    &= ~(OFIFG);
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*$PAGE*/
00074 /*
00075 *********************************************************************************************************
00076 *                                        InitPorts
00077 *
00078 * Description: Initialize the board ports
00079 *
00080 * Arguments  : none
00081 *
00082 * Returns    : none
00083 *
00084 * Note(s)    : 
00085 *********************************************************************************************************
00086 */
00087 static void InitPorts()
00088 {
00089    /* Setup the port 1 */
00090    P1SEL = HW_P1SEL; 
00091    P1DIR = HW_P1DIR; 
00092    P1OUT = HW_P1OUT; 
00093    P1IE  = HW_P1IE; 
00094    P1IES = HW_P1IES; 
00095 
00096    /* Setup the port 2 */                   
00097    P2SEL = HW_P2SEL; 
00098    P2DIR = HW_P2DIR; 
00099    P2OUT = HW_P2OUT; 
00100    P2IE  = HW_P2IE; 
00101    P2IES = HW_P2IES; 
00102 
00103    /* Setup the port 3 */ 
00104    P3SEL = HW_P3SEL;
00105    P3DIR = HW_P3DIR; 
00106    P3OUT = HW_P3OUT; 
00107 
00108    /* Setup the port 4 */                   
00109    P4SEL = HW_P4SEL; 
00110    P4DIR = HW_P4DIR; 
00111    P4OUT = HW_P4OUT;
00112 
00113    /* Setup the port 5 */                    
00114    P5SEL = HW_P5SEL; 
00115    P5DIR = HW_P5DIR; 
00116    P5OUT = HW_P5OUT; 
00117 
00118   /* Setup the port 6 */                   
00119    P6SEL = HW_P6SEL;
00120    P6DIR = HW_P6DIR; 
00121    P6OUT = HW_P6OUT; 
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*$PAGE*/
00125 /*
00126 *********************************************************************************************************
00127 *                                        InitHW
00128 *
00129 * Description: This function initializes the processor and ports.
00130 *
00131 * Arguments  : none
00132 *
00133 * Returns    : none
00134 *
00135 * Note(s)    : 
00136 *********************************************************************************************************
00137 */
00138 void InitHW()
00139 { 
00140    /* Initialize ports */
00141    InitPorts();
00142 
00143    /* Turn on the LED to indicate the init sequence */
00144    P4OUT |= LED1;
00145 
00146    /* Each stage lights a display segment */
00147    P2OUT |= DISP_A; 
00148    P3OUT &= ~(DISP1_EN|DISP2_EN);
00149 
00150    /* Initilaize the HFO */
00151    InitHFO();
00152 
00153    /* There was an error if HFO is not on and stable */
00154    if (BCSCTL1 & XT2OFF)
00155    {
00156        /* HFO stage error */
00157        P2OUT |= DISP_DP;
00158    }
00159    else
00160    {
00161        /* Source MCLK & SMCLK from it XT2 end HFO stage */
00162        BCSCTL2 |= INIT_BCSCTL2;
00163        P2OUT |= DISP_B;
00164    }
00165 
00166    /* Wait till the 5v are stabilized before initializing the LCD. */
00167    delay(LCD_PS_WAIT);
00168 
00169    /* Initilize the LCD */
00170    InitLCD();
00171 
00172    /* Add a stage light on segment display */
00173    P2OUT |= DISP_D; 
00174 
00175    /* Post Initial message on the LCD */
00176    WriteStringToLCD("OFAROOQ Final PRJ");
00177    
00178    /* Initialize the UART0  */
00179    InitMSP430UART0();
00180    
00181    /* Turn OFF the LED to indicate the init sequence */
00182    P4OUT &= ~(LED1); 
00183 
00184    /* Write 'init complete' message on LCD */
00185    SetLCDCursorPosition(LCD_LINE1);
00186    WriteStringToLCD("   OS SHELL   ");
00187 
00188    return;
00189 }
